titleStmt.title: A liberall maintenance is manifestly due to the ministers of the Gospell. By Ioshua Meene vicar of Wymondham in Norfolke
titleStmt.author: Meene, Joshua.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Harper, for Lawrence Chapman, and William Certain, and are to be sold at Chancery lane end in Holborne,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Maintenance for ministers.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
